title: Clicking League and it wont open
body: Im clicking league and then a message pops up asking if it can make changes to my computer. I say yes. Then nothing happens.

replies.body:
It could be that your antivirus picked it up as a false positive, since my avast had done the very same thing not too long ago.

I recommend checking your antivirus chest to see if it is there & if so restore & exclude it

This sounds like a permissions thing where it keeps checking for permission to make changes but isn't completing properly.  As a next step I'd recommend checking out our article about [setting up your permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104).  Let me know if it helps!
Still nothing has happen. It is still doing what its been doing.

Hmm...in that case, I'd recommend [sending in a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a better look at your individual situation.  When you send the ticket, make sure to include the following logs to help speed up the process:

* [Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)

* [Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)

* [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)

* [DxDiag](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)

The read/write permissions of the client have been jumbled...
I have also discovered that if you try to repair the client, nothing happens...and the client's exe crashes on splash.

I had to do a 100% completely fresh install.
Deleted all folders, and registry entries (I DO NOT RECOMMEND novices to registry editing and modification to take those steps).
Reinstalled, and i'm back in action.
Just tried to re install it, now it has the desktop icon but it has a blue and yellow shield on it. When I try to open it, it repeats the process I said earlier.
Same shit happen to me and my other friends (PS: We are on EU West)
